attributes.action: Keep the Ellen Badger Minor Injuries Unit, Shipston, open 24 hours
attributes.additional_details: The Ellen Badger MIU provides a vital service to people in the Shipston area. At a time when Accident and Emergency services are under unprecedented pressure the decision of the South Warwickshire NHS Foundation Trust to withdraw this service without public consultation is a wrong and foolhardy move. We must protect services at the Ellen Badger at all costs.
